text:
Featured

Resurrection – Coming to Discovery+ This Easter!

From Roma Downey & Mark Burnett, the producers of THE BIBLE SERIES and SON OF GOD, comes the next biblical epic — RESURRECTION, premiering on discovery+ March 27th. Join discovery+ to watch this epic biblical story following the immediate aftermath of Jesus’ crucifixion with your family just in time for the Easter season. Watch the trailer and sign up for discovery+ here.
title: LightWorkers

meta_data.description: LightWorkers are on a mission to brighten your day. We'll make you think, we might even make you cry, but hopefully, we'll add more light to your world.
